results.title: A Fatal Case of Lisinopril-Induced Acute Necrotizing Pancreatitis
results.text_hl: Angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors (ACE-I), such as @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, are used as first-line therapy in the treatment of @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@, @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@ with reduced ejection fraction, and @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@proteinuric chronic kidney disease@@@ due to their beneficial effects on reducing morbidity and mortality.

citations.NLM: Masarweh OM, Al-Moussally F, Meruvia Garron JP, Kunadia A, Karasik O, Asmar A. A Fatal Case of Lisinopril-Induced Acute Necrotizing Pancreatitis Cureus. 2023 Jun;15(6):e40071. PMID: 37304386
citations.BibTeX: @article{37304386, title={A Fatal Case of Lisinopril-Induced Acute Necrotizing Pancreatitis}, author={Masarweh OM and Al-Moussally F and Meruvia Garron JP and Kunadia A and Karasik O and Asmar A}, journal={Cureus}, volume={15}, number={6}, pages={e40071}}

results.title: Real-world evidence of lisinopril in pediatric hypertension and nephroprotective management: a 10-year cohort study.
results.text_hl: METHODS: This is a retrospective cohort study at Ghent University Hospital, Belgium, with 106 young @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ (1-18 years) treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ due to @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ (@DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@HTN@@@) and @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@chronic kidney disease@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@CKD@@@) assessed for treatment outcomes against clinical benchmarks over 10 years.

citations.NLM: Degraeuwe E, Gasthuys E, Snauwaert E, Dossche L, Prytula A, Dehoorne J, Vermeulen A, Walle JV, Raes A. Real-world evidence of lisinopril in pediatric hypertension and nephroprotective management: a 10-year cohort study. Pediatr Nephrol. 2024 Oct 28;():. PMID: 39466390
citations.BibTeX: @article{39466390, title={Real-world evidence of lisinopril in pediatric hypertension and nephroprotective management: a 10-year cohort study.}, author={Degraeuwe E and Gasthuys E and Snauwaert E and Dossche L and Prytula A and Dehoorne J and Vermeulen A and Walle JV and Raes A}, journal={Pediatr Nephrol}}

results.title: Chronic Kidney Disease of Non-traditional Etiology in a Young Man From Central America: Geography, Poverty, and Uncertain Pathophysiology Create a Formidable Medical Challenge
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was prescribed @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ at the time of diagnosis.

citations.NLM: Milki AA, Bechara M, Lew SQ, Poon AN. Chronic Kidney Disease of Non-traditional Etiology in a Young Man From Central America: Geography, Poverty, and Uncertain Pathophysiology Create a Formidable Medical Challenge Cureus. 2023 May;15(5):e38876. PMID: 37303355

results.title: The effect of diminazene, an angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 activator, on adenine-induced chronic kidney disease in rats.
results.text_hl: The present study investigated the effect of @CHEMICAL_Diminazene @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004133 @@@diminazene@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, or @CHEMICAL_Valsartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068756 @@@valsartan@@@ on @CHEMICAL_Adenine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000225 @@@adenine@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@chronic kidney disease@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@CKD@@@) in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Abdelrahman AM, Ali BH, Ali H, Manoj P, Al-Suleimani Y. The effect of diminazene, an angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 activator, on adenine-induced chronic kidney disease in rats. Fundam Clin Pharmacol. 2022 Oct 27;():. PMID: 36300543

results.title: EFFECTIVENESS OF LISINOPRIL AND AMLODIPINE COMBINATION AT HYPERTENSION WITH COMORBIDITY OF ARTERIOSCLEROSIS OBLITERANS IN GENERAL PRACTICE.
results.text_hl: For antihypertensive therapy, the most common drugs for use were selected - @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ + amplodipine in fixed doses of 10 and 5 mg, respectively.

citations.NLM: Babinets LS, Levchuk RD, Halabitska IM, Kryskiv OI. EFFECTIVENESS OF LISINOPRIL AND AMLODIPINE COMBINATION AT HYPERTENSION WITH COMORBIDITY OF ARTERIOSCLEROSIS OBLITERANS IN GENERAL PRACTICE. Wiad Lek. 2022;75(10):2407-2411. PMID: 36472269

results.title: The effect of swimming exercise on adenine-induced kidney disease in rats, and the influence of curcumin or lisinopril thereon
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ is commonly used in the management of @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@CKD@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@humans@@@.

citations.NLM: Ali BH, Karaca T, Al Suleimani Y, Al Za'abi M, Al Kalbani J, Ashique M, Nemmar A. The effect of swimming exercise on adenine-induced kidney disease in rats, and the influence of curcumin or lisinopril thereon PLoS One. 2017;12(4):e0176316. PMID: 28445490

results.title: [Effect of losartan, lisinopril and their combination on hemodynamics and morphofunctional parameters of the heart in patients with chronic cardiac failure].
results.text_hl: Combined treatment produced more significant improvement of @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@CHI@@@ symptoms than monotherapy with either drug.

citations.NLM: Tofan EF, Butorov IV, Gonchar VI, Nekula GI. [Effect of losartan, lisinopril and their combination on hemodynamics and morphofunctional parameters of the heart in patients with chronic cardiac failure]. Klin Med (Mosk). 2011;89(1):40-4. PMID: 21516765

results.title: Combination therapy with SMP-534 and an angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor provides additional renoprotection in 5/6 nephrectomized rats.
results.text_hl: The number of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@chronic kidney disease@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@CKD@@@) has continuously grown worldwide.
